sub_title: Project Lead in Supply Chain Strategies at Unilever
summary:
10 years of experience as an internal consultant and project leader in strategic initiatives for business process improvement, CAPEX decisions, and cost optimization. Capable in handling the entire project cycle, from financial and operational analyses, business case definition, to execution. Excels in working with cross-functional teams, bridging between the boardroom and the frontline, and managing internal stakeholders and external partners.

I have a strong interest to apply my skills in innovation initiatives fostering sustainable business.

awards.title: Fondation Rainbowbridge Scholarship Awardee
awards.description: This scholarship is awarded to one Asian or African female candidate per cohort admitted to the HEC Paris MBA program who can demonstrate leadership skills and a commitment to solving some of the social and economic issues affecting her home country.

organizations.name: Ateneo Management Engineering Association
organizations.position: Information Management Desk Head, Year Development Council, ME Freshmen Preparatory Course facilitator

organizations.name: Council of Organizations of the Ateneo
organizations.position: Special Projects Executive Team Member, Blue Christmas Project Head, COA Awards Project Head

profile_positions.description:
Senior analyst and project lead in initiatives across products and geographies dedicated to margin improvement, optimal network design, and product value unlock.

•	Delivered seven (7) design-to-value interventions conducted by analyzing cost, consumer insight, end-to-end supply chain and competitor benchmarking. Facilitated successful ideation workshops, resulting to €50M worth of opportunities, exceeding the target in each project.
•	Conducted a global manufacturing network design review to identify the optimal product flow and influence the sourcing strategy with consideration to scale-up and resilience. Identified at least €6M (17%) annual savings in supply chain cost.
•	Managed cross-functional stakeholders and built relationships to create buy-in and participation in our projects.

Product categories covered: Home Care (Laundry and Household), Toothbrush, Ice Cream, Dressings
Worked on projects for the ff. markets: SEA (Indonesia, Philippines), Australia, Russia, Eastern Europe, USA, Latin America (regional, Mexico, Brazil), & global projects
profile_positions.title: Internal Consultant for Supply Chain Strategies

profile_positions.description:
Member of a five-person team under the office of the COO working on strategic projects across the business.

•  Developed feasibility studies on high investment projects for cost and process improvement, delivered management-level recommendations and oversaw project execution involving cross functional teams. Projects include initiatives on:
   - fuel-burn reduction through retrofitting in-operation aircraft
   - software application/transition to digital; transition from classroom to online learning platform
   - process mapping and customized development of online monitoring system for setting up operations to new destinations

•  Supervised aircraft configuration and vendor selection exercise for linefit and retrofit programs, providing commercial evaluation, negotiating commercial terms and securing contractual agreements, achieving significant savings and incentives.

• Conducted research and operational analyses of various aspects of the airline operations for performance tracking, planning and process improvement; projects included crew rostering analysis, baggage handling, and delay analyses
profile_positions.title: Programs Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Under the 1-year JG Summit MT Program, functioned as a financial and operations analyst reporting to the VP of Airport Services

• Enabled accurate monitoring of KPI results across domestic airport stations by designing and implementing a measuring tool to track performance in achieving their annual targets.
• Streamlined administrative processes by creating monitoring systems using MS Excel VBA programming which decreased processing time, cost from food spoilage, and audit violations from training expiration.
• Developed the business case and proposed the implementation of auto-printed baggage tags to reduce human error in baggage tagging and check-in time per passenger by about nine percent.
• Evaluated the department budget proposal and quarterly cost reviews for reporting to higher 
  Management
• Ranked 3rd out of 14 graduates in the JG Summit Management Trainee Program.
profile_positions.title: Management Trainee - 5J Airport Services

profile_positions.description: Supported the customer marketing team in day-to-day tasks, designing and producing sales aid, and monitoring stock inventory.
profile_positions.title: Customer Marketing Intern
